message:
My Graduation Project is about Ship Reporting & Tracking using AIS (automatic identification system) ... something like this for example .. http://www.marinetraffic.com/ais/

please if anybody have got resources (even on tracking using GPS or anything related) it would be very helpful .. :D
story: Amr Adel shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Live Ships Map - AIS - Vessel Traffic and Positions
caption: marinetraffic.com
description: Vessel positions tracking based on AIS data. Real-time ship locations and port arrivals departures
